Article Title: WWE WrestleMania 41 results: Main Event Jey Uso wins the World title match, YEET!
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Jey Uso wins the WWE World title match at WrestleMania 41



WrestleMania 41 opened with a bang as the World Heavyweight Championship match between Jey Uso and Gunther kicked things off. Both superstars made grand entrances, drawing thunderous cheers from the crowd, especially for "Main Event" Jey Uso. Once the bell rang, Gunther immediately took control with his signature technical style, attempting to make Jey Uso submit early in the contest. The match was thrilling from start to finish, but it was Jey who emerged victorious. He gave it everything he had, clearly determined not to leave without the WWE World Title.At the start of the match, it was Gunther who took control, striking hard and dominating the action. But out of nowhere, Jey Uso stunned the WWE Universe by hitting a sudden Spear. Despite the impact, Gunther managed to kick out of the pin attempt.Gunther then regained momentum, delivering a powerful superplex from the top turnbuckle followed by a devastating powerbomb. Yet again, Jey showed resilience and kicked out.Jey responded with another Spear, followed immediately by a splash from the top rope. He went for the pin, but in a shocking turn, Gunther kicked out once more. Moments later, Gunther locked in his sleeper hold submission, but Jey managed to break the hold by reaching the ropes. The intensity escalated as both men began trading heavy blows.Gunther tried to force Jey to submit, but Jey countered with a powerbomb of his own. Then came the unthinkable ‚Äî Jey delivered two back-to-back superkicks, followed by three consecutive splashes from the top turnbuckle. To seal the deal, he nailed Gunther with a Spear and then locked in the sleeper hold. Gunther tapped out, and Jey Uso pulled off the unthinkable ‚Äî becoming the new WWE World Champion at WrestleMania.
Article Summary: Jey uso defeated gunther to win the wwe world heavyweight championship. The match was thrilling from start to finish, but it was jey who emerged victorious. Jey delivered two back-to-back superkicks, followed by three consecutive splashes from the top turnbuckle. To seal the deal, he nailed gunther with a spear and then locked in the sleeper hold.

Article Title: WWE WrestleMania 41 live results: Jade Cargill defeats Naomi in the one on one match
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Jade Cargill defeats Naomi at WrestleMania 41



Jade Cargill and Naomi finally collided in the ring to settle their long-standing rivalry. The intense feud reached its boiling point at WrestleMania , where both superstars clashed in a high-stakes battle. Jade came out swinging, launching into full-blown offense and unloading a flurry of strikes on Naomi right from the start.However, Naomi showed incredible resilience, turning the tide with a couple of powerful shots of her own. Tapping into a more aggressive, heel-like persona, she took control and kept Jade on the defensive.The highly anticipated showdown between Jade Cargill and Naomi unfolded. After weeks of an intense rivalry, both superstars finally stepped into the ring to settle their score once and for all. In the early moments of the match, it appeared that Naomi had the upper hand against Jade. However, the momentum swiftly turned, and Jade reminded the WWE Universe why she‚Äôs considered the most dominant female Superstar in the company.Overall, the match between Jade and Naomi was nothing short of spectacular, with both superstars giving it their all from start to finish. The bout featured several jaw-dropping moments, as each delivered incredible moves on the other. Naomi came out strong with an aggressive start, while Jade gradually built momentum and eventually turned the tide in her favor.As Naomi continued her relentless assault, Jade fought back and regained her footing, delivering a thunderous suplex that shifted the momentum. She followed up with a barrage of heavy blows to gain the upper hand.Just when the crowd thought Jade had full control, Naomi stunned everyone by hitting a bulldog from the top turnbuckle, immediately followed by a perfectly executed moonsault. Despite the impact, Jade shocked the audience by kicking out at the last second.In the climax of the match, Jade hoisted Naomi onto her shoulders and delivered a brutal powerbomb. Without wasting a moment, she followed it up with her devastating facebuster finisher, securing the pinfall and emerging victorious.
Article Summary: The highly anticipated showdown between jade cargill and naomi unfolded. After weeks of an intense rivalry, both superstars finally stepped into the ring to settle their score. The bout featured several jaw-dropping moments, as each delivered incredible moves on the other.

Article Title: Viral video: 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi in tears after debut IPL dismissal
Article Text:
Vaibhav Suryavanshi (BCCI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: In a moment that captured hearts across the cricketing world, 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi ‚Äôs dream IPL debut ended in tears -- literally.The Rajasthan Royals ‚Äô prodigy, playing his first-ever IPL match at just 14 years and 28 days old, lit up the Jaipur evening with an audacious 34 off 20 balls before being stumped by Rishabh Pant off Aiden Markram‚Äôs crafty off-spin.Opening alongside the ever-aggressive Yashasvi Jaiswal , Vaibhav wasted no time announcing himself.A clean six off Shardul Thakur set the tone, followed by a breathtaking first-ball six off Avesh Khan in the next over, placing him on a rare list of players to hit a six on their first IPL delivery.The young left-hander showed both flair and nerves of steel, taking on international-quality bowlers with ease, and sharing a brisk opening stand with Jaiswal.But as cricket has it, glory and heartbreak often walk hand in hand. In the 9th over, trying to dance down the track and work the ball into the leg side, Vaibhav lost his balance and Pant, ever alert, whipped the bails off in a flash.The TV replay confirmed the inevitable: his back foot was in the air.What followed was a gut-wrenching scene: the teenager couldn‚Äôt hold back his emotions as he walked off the field, wiping away tears.Watch:Vaibhav Suryavanshi may have exited with tears, but he left the field having etched his name in IPL folklore.For Rajasthan Royals and Indian cricket fans, this isn‚Äôt just a debut. It appears to be the beginning of something extraordinary.
Article Summary: 14-year-old vaibhav suryavanshi's dream ipl debut ended in tears -- literally. The rajasthan royals prodigy lit up the jaipur evening with an audacious 34 off 20 balls. But as cricket has it, glory and heartbreak often walk hand in hand.

Article Title: Tom Brady hints at betrayal and ‚Äòwillful blindness‚Äô as Gisele B√ºndchen gets closer to her new baby daddy
Article Text:
Tom Brady has revealed glimpses of his personal struggles, particularly in the wake of his divorce from supermodel Gisele B√ºndchen (Image via Getty Images)

From gridiron greatness to emotional vulnerability



When public image collides with private battles



Even the most successful athletes face challenges that stats and accolades can‚Äôt capture‚Äîand Tom Brady is no exception. Widely regarded as the greatest quarterback in NFL history , Brady's legendary career boasts an unmatched seven Super Bowl titles, yet behind the shine of championship rings lies a more vulnerable, human side he‚Äôs beginning to share with the world.For two decades, Tom Brady maintained a laser focus on football, becoming the ultimate symbol of discipline and competitive excellence. But recently, the 46-year-old has revealed glimpses of his personal struggles, particularly in the wake of his divorce from supermodel Gisele B√ºndchen . Brady, who is usually tight-lipped about his private life, opened up about the emotional toll of navigating heartbreak, admitting he‚Äôs dealt with moments of ‚Äúwillful blindness.‚ÄùThis phrase‚Äîsuggesting a conscious decision to ignore uncomfortable truths‚Äîpoints to the complexities Tom Brady faced in his marriage‚Äôs unraveling. While he didn‚Äôt name names, the context was unmistakable, especially given recent headlines surrounding B√ºndchen's ongoing relationship with her jiu-jitsu trainer, who is now widely rumored to be her partner and the father figure in her children‚Äôs lives.‚ÄúWillful blindness‚Äù is not just a phrase‚Äîit‚Äôs a powerful acknowledgment of emotional compromise. Tom Brady‚Äôs reflection reveals the cost of chasing perfection on the field while personal issues simmer in the background. The quarterback, once seemingly invincible both in his career and family life, now speaks like someone reckoning with the pain of being left behind. For fans, it‚Äôs a rare and raw admission: the GOAT is still just a man.The emotional fallout of watching B√ºndchen move on publicly is undoubtedly difficult for someone so accustomed to control and success. Reports of her being seen with her new partner and children add emotional weight to Brady‚Äôs recent comments, suggesting a sense of betrayal or at least loss.Also Read: Fresh discussion on Tom Brady and Gisele‚Äôs B√ºndchen‚Äôs marriage reignites debate over missed red flags Tom Brady‚Äôs recent openness signals a shift‚Äînot just for him but for the culture surrounding sports icons. His words serve as a reminder that personal pain doesn't discriminate by fame or fortune.As Brady transitions into the next chapter of his life, his legacy will now also include emotional authenticity‚Äîproof that true greatness isn't only measured by rings, but by the willingness to confront what hurts behind closed doors.
Article Summary: Tom brady has revealed glimpses of his personal struggles, particularly in the wake of his divorce from supermodel gisele b√ºndchen. Brady, who is usually tight-lipped about his private life, opened up about the emotional toll of navigating heartbreak.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs heartfelt anniversary post for Kobe Bryant earns reactions from Khloe Kardashian
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant, Kobe Bryant and Khloe Kardashian. Image via: Allen Berezovsky | NBC/Getty Images

Key Highlights



Vanessa Bryant ‚Äôs 24th anniversary tribute to Kobe touched hearts worldwide, with Khlo√© Kardashian joining in to honor their eternal love.

‚Äôs 24th anniversary tribute to Kobe touched hearts worldwide, with Khlo√© Kardashian joining in to honor their eternal love. Pau Gasol and his wife Catherine showed unwavering support with a heartfelt rose wreath on a day that mirrored Kobe‚Äôs iconic jersey number.

From snowy family trips to emotional tributes, Vanessa continues to keep Kobe and Gianna‚Äôs memory alive through strength, love, and legacy.

Vanessa Bryant

Khloe Kardashian reacted to Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs anniversary post for Kobe Bryant



It would have been 24 years, andshowed that she is holding onto her eternal bond with the late NBA legend Kobe Bryant . Vanessa recently celebrated their lasting bond, sharing a heartfelt tribute on social media which sparked emotional reactions from fans and celebrities alike, including Khloe Kardashian. Certainly, fans were also quick to celebrate Vanessa‚Äôs everlasting love for the Los Angeles Lakers legend.The NBA world and the Bryant family lost Kobe Bryant and his daughter Gianna Maria-Onore Bryant on 26 January 2020. While their untimely death still hit the NBA world hard, Vanessa Bryant has recently celebrated 24th years of her marriage to the late Kobe. Vanessa took to her Instagram to share the heartfelt post. ‚Äú#24. #Anniversary ‚ù§Ô∏è @kobebryant ‚õ™Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è 4/18/01 üôèüèΩ,‚Äù she wrote on the platform, sharing a throwback photo of the duo.Alongside several celebrities and popular NBA names, Khloe Kardashian left a series of loving emoticons in the comments, revealing her heartfelt nod to the eternal love.Vanessa continues to receive support from close friends like Pau Gasol and his wife, Catherine. It‚Äôs been just over five years since the devastating helicopter crash that took the lives of Kobe, their daughter Gianna, and seven others. Every milestone since then has been a painful reminder of the void they left behind. Vanessa has been keeping their memories alive and has often been met with grace and warmth from her inner circle.On their anniversary, Vanessa shared a nostalgic wedding photo from their 2001 ceremony in Dana Point, California‚Äî a simple gathering of just 12 guests. She looked nearly unrecognizable in the throwback. Adding to the emotion, Pau and Catherine Gasol sent her a stunning heart-shaped wreath of red roses, along with a message that read, ‚ÄúWe love you, forever. Happy 24th Anniversary. XOXO P,C,E,M,J.‚ÄùEarlier this year, she and her daughters‚Äî Natalia, 22, Bianka, 8, and Capri, 5‚Äîjoined the Gasols for a snowy family getaway. The trip included matching ski outfits and heartfelt memories that reminded everyone of the strength in chosen family.Also Read: Anthony Davis and Ja Morant spark early scuffle in intense Memphis Grizzlies-Dallas Mavericks play-in duel Vanessa has also continued celebrating Kobe‚Äôs legacy in quiet, powerful ways‚Äî from tearful Super Bowl tributes to fun Dodgers game outings with her daughters. Through every post and moment, she reminds the world that while Kobe may be gone, the love they shared is still very much alive.
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant recently celebrated the 24th anniversary of her marriage to the late kobe bryant. She shared a heartfelt tribute on social media which sparked emotional reactions from fans and celebrities alike, including khloe kardashian. It‚Äôs been just over five years since the devastating helicopter crash that took the lives of kobe, their daughter gianna, and seven others.

Article Title: NBA Trade Rumors: Golden State Warriors could bag $166 million Miami Heat superstar to form Big 3 with Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler
Article Text:
Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry (30) is congratulated by forward Draymond Green after making a 3-point basket during the second half of an NBA play-in tournament basketball game against the Memphis Grizzlies in San Francisco, Tuesday, April 15, 2025. (Image via AP Photo/Jeff Chiu)

Golden State Warriors

Bam Adebayo

(Disclaimer: The data and analysis in this post are based on conjecture as of right now. Although the information is based on reliable sources, it's crucial to remember that these are not official declarations or verified actions. It is advised that readers use caution when interpreting this analysis and wait for official updates as the offseason progresses.)

Why the Golden State Warriors Need to Move On from Buddy Hield

Bam Adebayo (Image via USA TODAY Sports)

"He‚Äôs looked more like a fraudulent splash brother as time has progressed."

Buddy Hield‚Äôs Decline in Key Stats

Bam Adebayo: The Ideal Frontcourt Upgrade

How Adebayo Fits with the Golden State Warriors

Thenarrowly escaped a Play-In disaster against the Memphis Grizzlies , securing the No. 7 seed in the Western Conference. But even with their postseason spot locked in, changes may be necessary this offseason‚Äîstarting with moving on from Buddy Hield and pursuing Miami Heat star, as predicted by Caleb Hightower of Sporting News Buddy Hield‚Äôs early-season promise as a Klay Thompson replacement has faded. His three-point shooting, once reliable, has plummeted to concerning lows:- December: 30.5% from three- January: 31.5% from three- Play-In performance: 1-of-4 from deep against MemphisWhile Hield finished the regular season at 37.0% from beyond the arc, his inconsistency makes him a liability. As Caleb Hightower noted,If the Golden State Warriors exit the playoffs early, targeting Bam Adebayo in a trade could reshape their roster. The three-time All-Star has evolved into a complete two-way force:- 2024-25 Stats: 18.1 PPG, 9.6 RPG, 4.3 APG- Shooting Splits: 48.5% FG, 35.7% 3P- Versatility: Scores inside, handles the ball, and stretches the floorAdebayo‚Äôs growth from a defensive specialist to an offensive weapon addresses Golden State‚Äôs need for a dynamic big man.1. Scoring Boost: Provides interior scoring and mid-range efficiency.2. Playmaking: Adds a facilitator from the high post.3. Defensive Anchor: Complements Draymond Green‚Äôs versatility.The Trade ScenarioA Hield-Adebayo swap wouldn‚Äôt improve the Warriors‚Äô outside shooting, but it would give them a proven All-Star to pair with Stephen Curry and Draymond Green. Miami, meanwhile, could benefit from Hield‚Äôs shooting if they retool their roster.Potential Trade Package- Warriors Receive: Bam Adebayo- Heat Receive: Buddy Hield, future draft picks, and/or young playersAlso read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles predicted to acquire 6-foot-8 Brooklyn Nets forward to form Big 3 with LeBron James and Luka Doncic Golden State‚Äôs playoff run will dictate their urgency, but pivoting from Hield to Adebayo makes sense. As Hightower‚Äôs analysis suggests, Bam Adebayo‚Äôs well-rounded game could be the missing piece for the Golden State Warriors‚Äô next championship push .
Article Summary: Bam adebayo could be the missing piece for the golden state warriors‚Äô next championship push. Buddy hield‚Äôs early-season promise as a klay thompson replacement has faded. The warriors could move on from hield and pursue the miami heat star.

Article Title: Stephen Curry and wife Ayesha steal the spotlight at Sinners premiere while LeBron and Savannah James keep it casual at private screening - See Pic
Article Text:
Image credit: Instagram/X

Key Highlights

Stephen Curry , wife Ayesha attended Sinners premiere

, wife Ayesha attended LeBron James and wife Savannah James hosted private screening of Sinners

and wife hosted private screening of Sinners Sinners released in the US on Friday

Stephen Curry and Ayesha attend Sinners premiere

LeBron James and Savannah host Sinners screening

Los Angeles Lakers power forward LeBron James and Golden State Warriors point guard Stephen Curry took time out from the playoffs to support and promote filmmaker Ryan Coogler and actor Michael B. Jordan ‚Äôs new film, Sinners. The basketball players were accompanied by their respective wives in their endeavor. Curry and his wife Ayesha attended the Sinners premiere on Thursday, while James and his wife Savannah hosted a private screening of the film.Directed by Ryan Coogler, Sinners stars Michael B. Jordan of Black Panther fame in the lead role. The film also features Hailee Steinfeld, Miles Caton, Jack O'Connell, and others. It was released in the U.S. on April 18.At the premiere, Stephen looked dapper in a casual gray suit, while Ayesha stunned in a little black dress paired with a jacket. As a picture of the couple from the premiere was shared online, fans couldn‚Äôt stop praising Ayesha for her look. One fan reacted on X, ‚ÄúAyesha looks beautiful. Steph is dapper‚Ä¶ but I need him to stay home and rest lol. He is so active. I need him to be a couch potato and conserve all his energy for these playoffs.‚Äù Another tweeted, ‚ÄúCan we have a moment to appreciate how absolutely stunning Ayesha is? She is glowing. Absolutely beautiful.‚Äù The picture was originally shared by J oslyn Ros e.Meanwhile, LeBron James and Savannah hosted a private screening of Sinners. They dressed casually for the gathering, with James in a sky-blue sweatshirt and pajama pants, and Savannah in a hoodie and pants. Sharing two pictures on X, James wrote, ‚ÄúMy brothers Ryan Coogler and Michael B. Jordan did it again!!! ABSOLUTELY INCREDIBLE FILM! Ryan, thank you for allowing my Queen, me, family, and friends to screen it. 10/10 movie! Make sure y‚Äôall go check out Sinners tomorrow! It‚Äôs a MUST SEE!!!!!!‚ÄùA fan reacted to his post, ‚ÄúNice to see him doing normal things like movie date nights.‚Äù Another tweeted, ‚ÄúNow let's win a championship. Let's go Lakers. #LakeShow.‚ÄùAlso Read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might sign 10x All-Star to support Luka Doncic and LeBron James in championship push The Los Angeles Lakers are set to face the Minnesota Timberwolves in the first round of the playoffs starting Saturday. The Golden State Warriors will play against the Houston Rockets on Sunday.
Article Summary: Stephen curry and wife ayesha attended the sinners premiere on thursday. Lebron james and wife savannah hosted a private screening of the film. Sinners stars michael b. jordan of black panther fame in the lead role. The film also features hailee steinfeld, miles caton, jack o'connell.

Article Title: WWE WrestleMania 41 Night 1 Results & Highlights (4/19/25): Paul Heyman sides with Seth Rollins, new champions crowned, and more
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Jey Uso vs Gunther

The New Day vs The War Raiders

Jade Cargill vs Naomi

LA Knight vs Jacob Fatu

El Grande Americano vs Rey Fenix

Tiffany Stratton vs Charlotte Flair

Roman Reigns vs CM Punk vs Seth Rollins

The first night of WrestleMania 41 was a night filled with top-class in-ring action, spectacular moments and a shocking end.WrestleMania 41 kicked off its first night in the Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas. The night saw new champions being crowned on the big stage, fast-paced in-ring showdowns, and memorable moments created. Moreover, the main event of WrestleMania 41 Night 1 saw a compelling showdown and ended with a shocker as Paul Heyman switched sides and joined with The Visionary, Seth Rollins This was the opening match between Jey Uso and Gunther for the World Heavyweight Championship. The bout saw Gunther dominate Jey Uso for the majority of the match, but the YEET man refused to back down. As the match approached its end, Uso connected with a handful of superkicks and splashes. He then nailed Gunther with a spear and, in a shocking turn, locked in the sleeper hold to make him tap out to become the new World Heavyweight Champion.The match was contested with WWE World Tag Team Championships on the line. Both teams went up against each other in an evenly matched showdown and classic display of tag team wrestling. However, in the end, The New Day's mean streak was able to capitalize on Erik and Ivar as they defeated them to become tag team champions for the 12th time in their career.The two heated rivals went back and forth against each other. Naomi's aggression caused her to inflict major damage on Jade Cargill. However, the Storm did not stay down and came back with the same fury. As the match came down to the final moments, Cargill delivered a combination of a Jackhammer and Jaded to pin Naomi for the win.This match was contested for the WWE United States Championship. Both men fought tooth and nail against each other with multiple near-falls and displaying some exciting in-ring moves. In the end, LA Knight connected with a BFT, but Jacob kicked out. He then took control and delivered a pair of moonsaults on the megastar to win the match and become the new WWE United States Champion.The match was originally supposed to feature El Grande Americano against Rey Mysterio, but he was replaced by Rey Fenix due to injury. The duo displayed an excellent match with their respective lucha styles. As the match came down to its final moments, El Grande once again had an object in his mask, and Rey Fenix hit his face as he was going for the Go to Amigo, injuring his leg. This gave El Grande the upper hand, and he hit the diving headbutt with the object still in his mask and picked up the win in his WrestleMania debut.This match was contested for the WWE Women's Championship. The match marked the debut of Tiffany Stratton at WrestleMania as she defended her title against her idol, Charlotte Flair, after weeks of a heated feud. Both women delivered one of the best matches of the night as they displayed some power-packed moves, leading to a thrilling encounter. As the dust settled, Tiffany Stratton delivered a powerslam and the Prettiest Moonsault Ever to retain her title.This was the main event match of WrestleMania 41 Night 1. It was a blockbuster showdown as three of the biggest names in the professional wrestling industry tore down the house at the Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas. Reigns, Punk, and Rollins delivered one of the captivating bouts in WrestleMania history, which went all over the ringside. The match saw all three men hitting their best moves, and multiple nearfalls as Paul Heyman watched on from ringside. As the match came to its end, Paul Heyman brought a chair and handed to CM Punk. He then low blowed him and gave the chair to Roman Reigns. As Reigns proceeded to attack Rollins, Heyman betrayed him as well and handed the chair to Rollins who took down Reigns to win the main event and joined forces with The Wiseman.Also read: WWE WrestleMania 41 results: Main Event Jey Uso wins the World title match, YEET!
Article Summary: Wrestlemania 41 kicked off its first night in the allegiant stadium in las vegas. The night saw new champions being crowned on the big stage, fast-paced in-ring showdowns, and memorable moments created. Main event of wrestlemania 41 night 1 saw a compelling showdown and ended with a shocker as paul heyman switched sides and joined with the visionary, seth rollins.

Article Title: Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs daughter Paulina Gretzky shows off her son‚Äôs golf talent while cheering on her husband at the Masters Tournament
Article Text:
Paulina Gretzky has stayed away from the controversies Wayne Gretzky has faced.(Image via Getty Images)

Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs daughter, Paulina Gretzky, shows off her son‚Äôs talent as Vera Wang comments on it



Wayne Gretzky ‚Äôs older daughter, Paulina Gretzky, has not associated herself with what her father went through in the last few months. As she maintained her silence, Paulina Gretzky has now been spotted supporting her husband, Dustin Johnson , at the Masters Tournament in Augusta and being with her children. Paulina Gretzky‚Äôs recent post is proof of that as she also shows off her son‚Äôs talent.Recently, Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs daughter, Paulina Gretzky, took to her social media to share a series of pictures from the Masters Tournament, where her husband, professional golfer Dustin Johnson, participated in.Paulina Gretzky posted pictures of walking alongside her husband as she carried his golf clubs for him. Dressed in a white jumpsuit, Paulina Gretzky looked stunning as she added a green coloured cap.Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs daughter, Paulina Gretzky, also posted a video of their son Tatum trying his hands at what his father is known for. Tatum Johnson was spotted golfing as both his parents cheered him on because of his talent.Tatum Johnson was also spotted wearing a similar white jumpsuit like his mother as it carried his father‚Äôs name on the back.But it was just not his parents who cheered him on; famous fashion designer Vera Wang also dropped a comment on Paulina Gretzky‚Äôs post.Vera Wang‚Äôs comment read as, ‚ÄúOkay Okay. Gorg caddy. Young DJ in the making‚Ä¶‚Ä¶,‚õ≥Ô∏èüèå‚ÄùWayne Gretzky was last spotted in public at the Chicago Blackhawks game, where he had arrived to see Alex Ovechkin tie his record. The NHL legend spoke highly of Alex Ovechkin and said, ‚ÄúI can tell you firsthand I know how hard it is to get to 894, 895 is pretty special. They say records are meant to be broken, but I‚Äôm not sure who‚Äôs gonna get more goals than that.‚ÄùWayne Gretzky also made an appearance on TNT and said, ‚ÄúI was really happy for him, I felt like I scored the goal, does that make any sense? I know the pressure he was under, the microscope he was under, honestly I was relieved‚Äù.Since the, Wayne Gretzky has not appeared in public and is keeping a low profile. The NHL legend is yet to address the whole controversy surrounding him related to the 4 Nations' final match.Also Read: "F**k you Don Sweeney‚Äù: Brad Marchand‚Äôs 1100th NHL game sparks outrage among Boston Bruins fans
Article Summary: Paulina gretzky has not associated herself with her father's controversies. She has now been spotted supporting her husband, dustin johnson, at the masters tournament in augusta and being with her children. The nhl legend is yet to address the controversy surrounding him related to the 4 nations' final match.

Article Title: Sonya Curry showers praise for Stephen Curry‚Äôs brother Seth Curry after his latest accolade: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm so proud of you‚Äù
Article Text:
Curry led the NBA with a career-best 45.6% from deep, becoming the second Hornets player to do so.

Sonya and Stephen Curry praised Seth for his resilience, while Coach Charles Lee applauded his leadership and work ethic.

praised Seth for his resilience, while Coach applauded his leadership and work ethic. Seth credited constant communication with coaches and his adaptability for helping him stay sharp all season.

Sonya Curry reacted to Seth Curry‚Äôs 3-Point percentage crown



Sonya Curry is a proud mother of two NBA stars‚Äî Stephen and Seth Curry. While Stephen Curry has made his name in the history of the league as one of the elite superstars, Seth Curry has also made waves in the scene playing for the Charlotte Hornets . Recently, Seth Curry has officially clinched the NBA‚Äôs three-point percentage title, capping off a season-long pursuit with the league‚Äôs most accurate shooting from beyond the arc. Sonya responded to her son‚Äôs latest accolade with a heartfelt note.As Seth Curry has secured the NBA‚Äôs three-point percentage crown, finishing the season as the league‚Äôs most efficient shooter from deep, his mother, Sonya Curry, reacted with a heartfelt gesture. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm so proud of you @sdotcurry ! You continue to excel and leave your mark on the NBA in your own way and in your own time! You have forged an impressive career through resilience and hard work! I love you!!!‚Äù Sonya wrote on Instagram.Seth Curry keeps showing steady improvement year after year. This time, he‚Äôs earned his first career NBA 3-point percentage title, becoming just the second player in Hornets history, alongside Glen Rice, to achieve the honor.His brother and the Golden State Warriors veteran, Stephen Curry also shared a congratulatory message. ‚ÄúCongratulations on leading the NBA this season in three-point percentage. Obviously, doing right by the Curry name.‚ÄùFormer NBA star and Seth's father Dell Curry was not keeping his thoughts on his son's achievements to himself. "Seth Curry, aka SDot. Well, what can I say other than I'm proud of you. Your're my son my golfing buddy, but most importently, my friend. So, congratulations Number 30," he said.‚ÄúObviously, it‚Äôs not something I think about coming into the year or even throughout the year,‚Äù Seth said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been in the top five a lot of times in my career, but I‚Äôve never finished the year No. 1. It‚Äôs a testament to consistent work ethic and being ready. It‚Äôs a great accomplishment, something me and my dad have now, and Steph does not have. Yeah, it means a little bit something,‚Äù he continued.This season, Seth hit a career-high 45.6% from beyond the arc, knocking down 83 of his 182 attempts.‚ÄúI think I check my numbers maybe two or three times a year. I‚Äôm just going out there, playing the right way, trying to lead this group on and off the floor. If I‚Äôm open, be aggressive, make plays, knock down shots. If I‚Äôm not, swing it to the open guy. For me, it‚Äôs just going out there, playing simple basketball, making my open shots, creating for my teammates and creating space when I can, make it easier on them. Just try to give confidence to the group.‚ÄùReflecting on his journey through a challenging season, Seth shared how constant communication with the coaching staff kept him mentally locked in. ‚ÄúThe constant communication with coach was good,‚Äù he said, explaining how he stayed prepared despite fluctuating minutes. ‚ÄúMy adaptability and being able to come in with a rhythm‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs important,‚Äù Curry noted. ‚ÄúCome in, make shots right away ‚Äì that‚Äôs important,‚Äù he added.Also Read: ‚ÄúBasketball Gods smiled down‚Äù ‚Äì Magic Johnson sends clear message about NBA playoff matchups for fans Hornets Head Coach Charles Lee also reacted to Seth‚Äôs latest milestone. ‚ÄúVery excited for Seth,‚Äù Lee said adding, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs cool for our organization, but even cooler for him. To achieve that after all the work he‚Äôs put in throughout his whole career, I‚Äôm very happy for him. I‚Äôm grateful for everything he‚Äôs given to our team as that veteran leader, but also kudos to our whole organization for investing in player development.‚Äù
Article Summary: Curry led the nba with a career-best 45.6% from deep, becoming the second hornets player to do so. Sonya and stephen curry praised seth for his resilience, while coach charles lee applauded his leadership and work ethic. Seth credited constant communication with coaches and his adaptability for helping him stay sharp all season.

Article Title: 'Veteran cricketer asked to sleep with me': Anaya Bangar, Sanjay Bangar's child, makes bold confession
Article Text:
Anaya Bangar (Image credit: Instagram)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll What do you think is more important for a healthy sports environment? Supporting inclusivity and diversity within teams Creating a safe and respectful environment for all players

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

NEW DELHI: Anaya Bangar , daughter of former India cricketer and coach Sanjay Bangar , has spoken out about the toxic masculinity that continues to plague the cricketing world. In a candid interview, Anaya revealed disturbing experiences she has faced within the cricketing circle, including receiving nude photos from cricketers, verbal abuse, and being propositioned by a former player.Anaya, who publicly came out last year and shared her journey of transformation through hormone replacement therapy and gender-affirming surgery , was formerly known as Aryan. She followed in her father‚Äôs footsteps, playing age-group cricket in India. However, she said the journey after transitioning came with many challenges.‚ÄúThere has been support and there have been some harassment as well,‚Äù Anaya said during an interview with Lallantop, reflecting on her journey.When asked how fellow cricketers responded after her gender-affirming surgery, Anaya said: ‚ÄúThere have been a few cricketers who randomly sent me nude pictures of them.‚ÄùShe also shared more distressing experiences:‚ÄúThe person used to give gaalis in front of everybody. The same person then used to come and sit beside me and ask for my photos. There was another instance, when I was in India, I told a puraane (veteran) cricketer about my situation. He told me let‚Äôs go in the car, I want to sleep with you.‚ÄùHaving played alongside prominent Indian cricketers like Musheer Khan, Sarfaraz Khan, and Yashasvi Jaiswal during her early years, Anaya said she was forced to keep her identity hidden because of her father‚Äôs public profile.‚ÄúI had to maintain secrecy about myself because dad is a well known figure. Cricket world is filled with insecurity and toxic masculinity,‚Äù she added.Anaya has represented Islam Gymkhana in Mumbai‚Äôs club circuit and also played for Hinckley Cricket Club in Leicestershire, UK.However, her cricketing ambitions faced a major setback in November 2023, when the International Cricket Council (ICC) introduced a new policy barring transgender women from participating in international women‚Äôs cricket.‚ÄúInclusivity is incredibly important to us as a sport, but our priority was to protect the integrity of the international women‚Äôs game and the safety of players,‚Äù then-ICC CEO Geoff Allardice had said.Anaya responded to the policy with a detailed post on Instagram, expressing her disappointment with the decision.She currently resides in the United Kingdom.
Article Summary: Anaya bangar is the daughter of former india cricketer and coach sanjay bangar. She publicly came out last year and shared her journey of transformation. Anaya has represented islam gymkhana in mumbai‚Äôs club circuit and also played for hinckley cricket club in leicestershire.

Article Title: NYT Strands today: Clues, answers, Spangram for April 18, 2025
Article Text:
NYT Strands April 18, 2025 ‚Äì Hints, answers, Spangram



Today's NYT Strands puzzle theme

The theme for today‚Äôs Strands is 'On the board'

Hints for today‚Äôs Strands



Hints

Hint #1: a classic two-player strategy puzzle where players try to guess and destroy their opponent‚Äôs boats.

a classic two-player strategy puzzle where players try to guess and destroy their opponent‚Äôs boats. Hint #2: the most basic element in ‚ÄúMahjong‚Äù.

NYT Strands April 18, 2025 ‚Äì Hints, answers, Spangram



Spangram for today



GamePieces

Today's Strands‚Äô answers:



DOMINO

CHECKER

KNIGHT

TILE

BATTLESHIP

TOKEN

What are NYT Strands and how to play the game?



Tips for solving NYT Strands puzzle



The New York Times published its inaugural crossword puzzle on February 15, 1942, in the Sunday Magazine. Created by Charles Erlenkotter and edited by Margaret Farrar, it was the first major newspaper to feature a crossword puzzle. Over the years, the NYT has introduced several beloved games, including the Mini Crossword in 2014, followed by Spelling Bee, Letter Boxed, and Tiles. In 2022, the NYT launched the wildly popular Wordle, followed by additional games like Connections and Strands.NYT Strands is the latest addition to its puzzle offerings. This engaging daily game presents players with new themes each day, challenging them to uncover all the words on the grid. One of the game‚Äôs highlights is the special Spangram, which stretches across two sides of the board. With its innovative approach to word puzzles, Strands quickly became a fan favorite, adding to the diverse and exciting puzzle lineup of the New York Times.Having trouble solving today‚Äôs NYT Strands puzzle? We‚Äôre here to help with some easy hints to fuel your curiosity even more. Plus, we‚Äôve got today‚Äôs answer waiting for you ‚Äì just keep reading.Below, we‚Äôve shared the hints, answers, and Spangram for today‚Äôs NYT Strands puzzle. The hints may give away part or all of the Strands, so proceed with caution. Scroll down to continue:is the Spangram for today‚Äôs NYT Strands puzzle.Strands is a puzzle game that blends elements of Connections, Spelling Bee, and classic crossword puzzles. Players are given 48 letters arranged on a 6 x 8-inch grid, along with a daily theme. The goal is to solve the Spangram and uncover all the theme-related words.To play, connect letters on the grid to form words by dragging your mouse or fingers (on a touchscreen) in horizontal, vertical, or diagonal directions.Start by identifying the central theme word or Spangram, which will help you understand the puzzle‚Äôs theme.In addition to the Spangram, you must also find other words related to the theme hidden in the grid. Once you‚Äôve uncovered them all, the puzzle is complete.Identify the theme words: Fill in the grid with the theme words. Once found, they will be highlighted in blue and won't overlap with each other.Find the Spangram: Identify the Spangram, a key part of the puzzle that connects two opposite sides of the grid. It encapsulates the theme and may consist of two words. The Spangram will be highlighted in yellow once you‚Äôve located it.Take advantage of hints: Pay attention to off-topic words for clues. For every three non-theme words you uncover, letters will be highlighted to give you a hint toward finding a theme word, without directly revealing it.
Article Summary: Strands is a puzzle game that blends elements of connections, spelling bee, and classic crossword puzzles. Players are given 48 letters arranged on a 6 x 8-inch grid, along with a daily theme. The goal is to solve the spangram and uncover all the theme-related words.

Article Title: WWE WrestleMania 41 results: Seth Rollins wins the triple threat match by the help of Paul Heyman
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Seth Rollins wins the triple threat match at WrestleMania 41



Finally, the moment everyone had been waiting for arrived‚Äîthe main event of the night: a colossal Triple Threat match featuring Seth Rollins Roman Reigns , and CM Punk .All three superstars made electrifying entrances, but it was CM Punk‚Äôs that truly stole the spotlight. Walking in alongside Paul Heyman, Punk's entrance marked the first time in years that Roman Reigns entered a match alone‚Äîwithout his "Wiseman" by his side.As the bell rang, Punk immediately rolled out of the ring, mocking Reigns by chatting with Heyman about both Roman and Seth. This made Roman furious, while Seth couldn‚Äôt help but laugh at the situation. Without wasting a second, Reigns lashed out and struck Rollins.Roman began asserting dominance, unleashing a number of strikes on both Punk and Rollins. But Rollins quickly recovered, launching a suicide dive onto Reigns at ringside and throwing him into the steel steps.The action spilled into the crowd, with Punk and Rollins brawling fiercely. Both superstars took full advantage of the No Disqualification stipulation, battling with steel chairs and trash cans. Punk even slammed Rollins onto a trash can, sending the audience into a frenzy.Just when it seemed like chaos couldn‚Äôt get any crazier, Roman Reigns leaped into the crowd, taking down both Rollins and Punk before clearing off the announce table to continue his assault.Back inside the ring, Reigns continued to dominate until Punk reversed a Superman Punch attempt. The momentum shifted in Punk‚Äôs favor as he began landing heavy shots on both opponents, even hitting simultaneous DDTs on Reigns and Rollins. Reigns charged in for a Spear, but Punk reversed it into a GTS‚Äîonly for Reigns to counter, and the two exchanged a brutal series of strikes.Punk then locked Reigns in the Anaconda Vise, but Rollins broke it up with a top-rope splash. Rollins followed up with back-to-back Buckle Bombs on both Punk and Reigns.As the match reached its climax, Rollins lifted Punk for a Pedigree, but Reigns speared Punk mid-move. Reigns then tried to spear Rollins, but Rollins countered mid-air into a Pedigree of his own!Just when Punk was about to deliver a GTS to Rollins, Reigns hit Rollins with a spear‚Äîonly for Punk to immediately hit Reigns with the GTS. Shockingly, Roman kicked out at two.In a surprising twist, Rollins attempted to convince Reigns to work together and take out Punk. He even suggested performing the classic Shield triple powerbomb, but Reigns turned on Rollins and powerbombed Punk through the announce table himself.And then, everything changed.In one of the most shocking moments in WWE history, Paul Heyman did the unthinkable. He slid a steel chair into the ring, seemingly helping Punk. But just as Punk prepared to strike Reigns, Heyman delivered a low blow to Punk!Heyman then handed the chair to Reigns, appearing to realign himself with the Tribal Chief. But in another jaw-dropping twist, just as Reigns went to attack Rollins, Heyman low-blowed Reigns too!Capitalizing on the moment, Rollins grabbed the steel chair, blasted Reigns with it, and followed up with a devastating Curb Stomp. Rollins pinned Reigns and walked away with the victory in one of the most unpredictable, chaotic, and unforgettable main events in sports entertainment history.
Article Summary: Seth rollins defeated cm punk and roman reigns in a triple threat match at wrestlemania 41. The match was the first time in years that reigns entered a match alone without his "wiseman" by his side. In a shocking twist, paul heyman low-blowed reigns as he prepared to strike rollins.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Gujarat Titans captain Shubman Gill fined Rs 12 lakh for his team's slow over-rate
Article Text:
Ahmedabad: Gujarat Titans' batter Shubman Gill walks off the ground after his dismissal during the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 cricket match between Gujarat Titans and Delhi Capitals, at Narendra Modi Stadium, in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. (PTI Photo/Kamal Kishore)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Jos Buttler Exclusive Interview: I owe Jayawardene for letting me open in T20

Gujarat Titans captain Shubman Gill has been fined Rs 12 lakh for maintaining a slow over-rate during their IPL 2025 match against Delhi Capitals at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad on Saturday, marking the team's first over-rate offense of the season.The penalty was imposed under Article 2.22 of the IPL's Code of Conduct, which deals with minimum over-rate offenses. Gill, who was run out for seven runs in the match, joins other captains who have faced similar fines this season.DC's Axar Patel, MI's Hardik Pandya, RR's Riyan Parag and Sanju Samson, and LSG's Rishabh Pant have all previously been fined for over-rate offenses in IPL 2025.Despite the penalty, Gujarat Titans emerged victorious in the match, successfully chasing down 204 runs with four balls remaining in challenging Ahmedabad heat conditions.Jos Buttler played a crucial role in the victory, scoring an unbeaten 97 off 54 balls. He formed significant partnerships of 60 runs with B. Sai Sudharsan and 119 runs with Sherfane Rutherford.The chase marked a historic moment for GT as it was their first successful pursuit of a 200-plus total in their IPL history. It was also the first time any team had chased such a target against Delhi Capitals.GT's bowling attack contributed significantly, with Prasidh Krishna taking 4-41. Mohammed Siraj, Arshad Khan, Ishant Sharma, and R. Sai Kishore each claimed one wicket.The victory has propelled Gujarat Titans, the IPL 2022 champions, to the top of the 2025 season points table with 10 points from seven games. Delhi Capitals currently hold the second position, separated only by net run rate.GT will next face defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders at Eden Gardens on Monday evening, which notably is Gill's former IPL team.
Article Summary: Gujarat titans captain shubman gill has been fined rs 12 lakh for maintaining a slow over-rate during their ipl 2025 match against delhi capitals. The penalty was imposed under article 2.22 of the ipl's code of conduct, which deals with minimum over- rate offenses.

Article Title: Yuzvendra Chahal and RJ Mahvash fuel dating speculation with airport sighting
Article Text:
RJ Mahavash (left) was spotted with Punjab Kings cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

From golden duck to 39-ball ton! Priyansh Arya follows Ricky Ponting's first-ball six advice

Social media star RJ Mahvash , who raised eyebrows among netizens after her appearance with cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal at the Champions Trophy Final , has further fuelled dating rumours with her regular presence at Punjab Kings ' matches in this year's Indian Premier League (IPL).RJ Mahvash was recently seen with Chahal before the match between Royal Challengers Bengaluru and Punjab Kings at the Chandigarh airport.A video of them boarding the team bus with other Punjab Kings teammates has gone viral.Exiting the Chandigarh airport alongside other team members, the rumoured couple, Yuzvendra and Mahvash, were captured in a video shared on Instagram, appearing happy as they headed towards the team bus.Yuzvendra Chahal's personal life has been under scrutiny following his recent separation from influencer and choreographer Dhanashree, whom he married in 2020 and officially announced their split on March 20, 2025.Amidst this, dating rumours involving Chahal and Mahvash have been circulating online for several months. Mahvash has frequently been seen supporting Chahal's team, the Punjab Kings, during the IPL 2025 season. Following a notable performance by Chahal in Mohali, Mahvash publicly praised him with a selfie, referring to him as "a talented man."Adding fuel to the speculation, Mahvash attended a Punjab Kings match in Chandigarh last week and shared numerous pictures from the stadium. One image captured her enthusiastic cheering, while another was a selfie alongside Yuzvendra Chahal, further intensifying the dating buzz. She accompanied the selfie with a supportive message, to which Chahal responded warmly, calling them his "spine."After a slow start to the tournament, Chahal has registered two back-to-back match-winning performances for the Punjab Kings. The 34-year-old has picked up 8 wickets in seven matches so far.After dismantling Royal Challengers Bengaluru at their home turf on Friday, a high-flying Punjab Kings unit will look to complete a season double when the two teams clash again in Match 37 of IPL 2025 on Sunday in New Chandigarh.
Article Summary: Rj mahvash has been spotted with punjab kings cricketer yuzvendra chahal. The pair were seen boarding the team bus at the chandigarh airport. The 34-year-old has separated from his wife, dhanashree, in 2020.

Article Title: Ukrainian tennis player Tsurenko sues WTA and its chairman for causing ''emotional distress''
Article Text:
Ukrainian tennis player Tsurenko sues WTA and its chairman for causing ''emotional distress''

NEW YORK: Ukrainian tennis player Lesia Tsurenko has filed an amended lawsuit that accuses the WTA Tour and its chairman, Steve Simon , of a breach of contract, negligence and the "negligent infliction of emotional distress" because of the way it has handled Russian and Belarusian players amid the war in Ukraine. Tsurenko, who was once among the world's top 25, claims in the lawsuit that WTA executives - including Simon, who was its CEO at the time - failed to follow through on assurances made in a meeting with Ukrainian players that the organization would ban Russian or Belarussian players who publicly supported the war with Ukraine.The amended lawsuit, filed Tuesday in federal court for the Southern District of New York, cited examples such as Russian player Veronika Kudermetova wearing a patch at the French Open for sponsor Taneft, a subsidiary of a company that was sanctioned by the European Union for helping to supply the Russian army."Despite this promise," the lawsuit from Tsurenko claims, "neither Defendant Steve Simon nor Defendant WTA banned Russian and Belarus players who publicly supported the war."The WTA said in a statement to The Associated Press on Wednesday that it has been "steadfast and clear in its condemnation of Russia's war on Ukraine and the actions of the Russian government against the Ukrainian people.""Consistent with our position," the statement said, "the WTA has taken numerous steps to assist our Ukrainian player members, who have faced great challenges as professional athletes. The WTA has been equally clear that it was founded on principles of equality and non-discrimination and its rules provide that competitions are open to all women players who qualify based on their merit, and without discrimination. Consistent with those principles, and in common with other tennis organizations, the WTA has taken the position that individual athletes should not be penalized for the actions of their governments."Shortly after Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine in February 2022, the WTA Tour, ATP Tour and International Tennis Federation issued a joint statement in which it said Russian and Belarusian athletes would be allowed to compete as long as they did not compete under their nation's flags. That policy remains in place with Russian and Belarusian athletes competing at last year's Paris Olympics as "Individual Neutral Athletes;" Russian players Mirra Andreeva and Diana Shnaider won silver in women's doubles.Tsurenko's lawsuit states that she was forced to withdraw from an event at Indian Wells because of a panic attack from having to potentially play against Russians and Belarusians, and that she had "developed excessive stress, loss of concentration affecting her performance at tennis games, mortification and injury to her feelings."Lindsay Brandon, the WTA director of safeguarding, informed Tsurenko in 2023 that Simon would be investigated for violating its code of conduct. But that October, the organization informed her that Simon had not violated its code nor any provision of the employee handbook. Tsurenko tried to appeal but was unsuccessful."Even in my worst nightmares, I couldn't imagine that the professional tour, which I considered my home, would become a terrifying and alien place, where the (former) CEO of the organization consciously committed an act of moral abuse against me, leading to a panic attack and my inability to do my job," Tsurenko wrote Tuesday on social media.The initial complaint filed in November requests a trial by jury.Proskaeur Rose, the law firm representing the WTA, filed a motion last month to dismiss the case on the grounds that Tsurenko's claims were "legally defective." The WTA has until April 30 to decide whether it will continue with its motion to dismiss."While the WTA has the greatest sympathy for the significant challenges that Ms. Tsurenko and our other Ukrainian athletes have faced," its statement said Wednesday, "we are disappointed that she has decided to engage in litigation to seek to hold the WTA responsible for her distress. At all times, the WTA and its management acted appropriately and in accordance with our rules, and we are confident that we will prevail in this litigation."
Article Summary: Ukrainian tennis player lesia tsurenko sues wta and its chairman for causing ''emotional distress'' wta says in a statement that it has been "steadfast and clear in its condemnation of russia's war on ukraine" the wta has until april 30 to decide whether it will continue with its motion to dismiss.

Article Title: Who won yesterday's IPL match GT vs DC, RR vs LSG: Yesterday IPL match result
Article Text:
LSG vs RR (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

NEW DELHI: Saturday's IPL 2025 double-header served up two nail-biters, with Jos Buttler and Avesh Khan playing lead roles in contrasting fashion to guide Gujarat Titans and Lucknow Super Giants to memorable wins over Delhi Capitals and Rajasthan Royals, respectively.In Ahmedabad, Buttler weathered cramps and unleashed a blistering unbeaten 97 off 54 balls to steer Gujarat Titans to a seven-wicket victory over Delhi Capitals.Chasing 204, GT overcame early hiccups with Shubman Gill and B Sai Sudharsan departing early, but Buttler anchored the chase alongside Sherfane Rutherford (43), the pair adding a match-turning 119-run stand for the third wicket.Buttler‚Äôs knock was a masterclass in timing and power; he famously took apart Mitchell Starc for five consecutive boundaries in the 15th over, blending classical strokeplay with brute efficiency.Despite missing out on a hundred, Buttler ensured the chase ended with four balls to spare as Rahul Tewatia finished things in style.Earlier, Prasidh Krishna‚Äôs 4/41 helped restrict DC to 203/8 despite fighting knocks from Axar Patel (39) and Ashutosh Sharma (37 off 19).In Jaipur, Avesh Khan delivered under extreme pressure, defending nine runs in the final over as Lucknow Super Giants eked out a two-run win against Rajasthan Royals.RR, chasing 181, were coasting at 156/2 in 17 overs with a blazing Yashasvi Jaiswal (74) and 14-year-old debutant Vaibhav Suryavanshi (34) setting the tone.But Avesh‚Äôs deadly 18th over, removing Jaiswal and Riyan Parag, turned the game on its head.With nine needed off the final six, Avesh dismissed Shimron Hetmyer and conceded just six runs, finishing with 3/37 and sealing a heist win for LSG.Earlier, Aiden Markram (66) and Ayush Badoni (50) helped LSG post a competitive 180/5, with Abdul Samad‚Äôs 10-ball 30 lifting them past 175.The wins saw Gujarat Titans climb to the top of the table, while Lucknow Super Giants revived their campaign with a gritty, last-over triumph that will be talked about for days.
Article Summary: Gujarat titans beat delhi capitals by seven wickets in ipl 2025. Lucknow super giants beat rajasthan royals by two runs in jaipur. Jos buttler and avesh khan played lead roles in contrasting fashion.

Article Title: Rangers fire Head Coach Peter Laviolette after disastrous season ‚Äî But is he really to blame?
Article Text:
New York Rangers fire Head Coach Laviolette after collapse, front office under scrutiny (Image via: Getty Images)

Key Highlights:

Laviolette fired after playoff miss



fired after playoff miss Rangers suffer historic post-trophy collapse

suffer historic post-trophy collapse Drury's leadership faces growing criticism

Is Laviolette the fall guy for front office failures?



New York Rangers fire head coach Peter Laviolette | Instant Reaction

Rangers fire Head Coach, but front office missteps fuel deeper crisis



In a move that‚Äôs more scapegoat than solution, the New York Rangers fired head coach Peter Laviolette on Saturday and with it, tried to wash their hands of one of the most embarrassing collapses in recent franchise history. After a record-setting 2022-23 season, the Rangers didn‚Äôt just miss the playoffs in 2024, they imploded. And rather than admit the problem runs deeper than the bench, GM Chris Drury seems content pinning it all on the coaching staff.Let‚Äôs call it what it is: the Rangers' issues didn‚Äôt start or end with Peter Laviolette. Yes, the team underperformed. Yes, their power play was abysmal. But to act like the man behind the bench is the root of the problem is a convenient narrative that protects the real culprits, the ones in suits, not skates.Drury‚Äôs roster decisions were puzzling all season long. Trading captain Jacob Trouba mid-season raised eyebrows. Shipping off Kaapo Kakko and Filip Chytil while shuffling in new faces like J.T. Miller and Carson Soucy only added to the instability. And let‚Äôs not forget the March deadline moves that felt more like desperation than direction. The chemistry never clicked because the pieces kept changing and that‚Äôs not on Laviolette.Worse yet, the Rangers are now part of a not-so-proud club, one of only four teams in NHL history to win the Presidents‚Äô Trophy and miss the playoffs the very next season. That‚Äôs not just a stumble. That‚Äôs a structural failure.Still, Drury insists his job is safe and that ‚Äúit starts with me.‚Äù But if it truly started with him, he wouldn‚Äôt be dodging questions about ownership‚Äôs confidence. He wouldn‚Äôt be pushing the narrative that a new coach, whether it‚Äôs a recycled NHL name or an unproven college upstart, is the magic fix.Also Read: Penguins duo Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin set rivalry aside, celebrate Alex Ovechkin‚Äôs historic goal record with Rolex gift And where does this leave the locker room? A rotating door of coaches, a confused roster, and now a fanbase expected to trust that the next hire will right the ship. The truth is, the Rangers' problems won‚Äôt be solved with a new face behind the bench. Until the front office owns up to its missteps, New York is chasing shadows.The Rangers didn‚Äôt just fire Laviolette. They lit the fuse on a bigger crisis.
Article Summary: New york rangers fire head coach peter laviolette after collapse. Gm chris drury seems content pinning it all on the coaching staff. The rangers' problems won't be solved with a new face behind the bench. Until the front office owns up to its missteps, new york is chasing shadows.

Article Title: AI giant's Desi CEO Aravind Srinivas calls this MS Dhoni query a ‚Äògreat use of AI‚Äô
Article Text:
Perplexity AI identifies MS Dhoni‚Äôs controversial IPL incident
